ai-patthana8.11:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana8.11:1.1_0: There is no cause or condition for form.
ai-patthana8.11:1.1_1: There is no cause or condition for form;
ai-patthana8.11:1.1_2: Nor do they arise because of form and formless, and neither formless nor causes.
ai-patthana8.11:2.1_0: Nor does one give rise to form nor is a cause.
ai-patthana8.11:2.1_1: Nor does one give rise to form nor is a cause.
ai-patthana8.11:2.1_2: Nor do they arise because of form and formless, and neither perception nor non-perception.
ai-patthana8.11:3.1_0: Nor do they give rise to form ...
ai-patthana8.11:3.1_1: Nor do form and formlessness dependent on the formless.
ai-patthana8.11:3.1_2: Nor do they arise because of form and formless, and neither formless nor non-percipient.
ai-patthana8.11:4.1_0: For the sake of letting go of negligence ...
